hymn.title: Open up to your parents
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—Opening Up

layout.singingstanza: O -- pen up to your par -- ents, o -- pen up. O -- pen up to your par -- ents, o -- pen up. For you know your par -- ents love you, They're the best ones who can help you, But it's up to you to come and o -- pen up.

lyrics.stanza: Open up to your parents, open up. Open up to your parents, open up. For you know your parents love you, They're the best ones who can help you, But it's up to you to come and open up.

Come and tell your troubles to them, open up. Come and tell your troubles to them, open up. Let them know how you are feeling, For you know that they are caring About everything you're sharing, open up.
